title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.1 - Roadway deck
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.1 - Roadway deck

State Regulations

Bicycles may be operated on the roadway deck of any bridge
equipped with deck surfaces and railings consistent with the standards
currently recommended by the American Society of Highway and Transportation

Officials for the design of facilities to accommodate
bicycles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
205.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
